features: NICK FURY RETURNS TO MARVEL LEGENDS: In the years following the Blip, a weary Fury must face his biggest and most personal challenge yet when he learns of the Skrulls' clandestine invasion of Earth

MARVEL STUDIOS’ SECRET INVASION: This Nick Fury action figure is inspired by the character’s appearance in Marvel Studios’ Secret Invasion series on Disney Plus and makes a great addition to any Marvel Legends action figures collection
SERIES-INSPIRED ACCESSORIES: This collectible Hasbro Marvel Legends action figure comes with 8 entertainment-inspired accessories, including blaster accessories

PREMIUM DESIGN AND ARTICULATION: Marvel fans and collectors can display this fully articulated 6-inch scale action figure featuring poseable head, arms, and legs, as well as premium deco, in their collections

BUILD A MULTIVERSE OF COLLECTIBLES: Look for more entertainment-inspired Marvel Legends action figures to build your own Marvel Multiverse of 6 inch action figures (Each sold separately. Subject to availability)
INCLUDES BUILD-A-FIGURE PART(S) (HYDRA STOMPER): This figure includes at least one Build-A-Figure piece. Collect all the figures to assemble an additional figure
body.description: In the years following the Blip, a weary Fury must face his biggest and most personal challenge yet when he learns of the Skrulls' clandestine invasion of Earth. Bring the excitement and wonder of the Marvel Universe to your collection with action figures from the Hasbro Marvel Legends Series! (Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability.) This collectible 6-inch -scale Marvel Legends action figure is detailed to look like the Nick Fury character from Marvel Studios’ Secret Invasion, featuring premium detail and multiple points of articulation. Copyright 2023 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Marvel Legends Series | Nick Fury For 20 years, the Marvel Legends series has brought the iconic characters and stories of Marvel to life for fans and collectors around the world with premium action figures drawn from across the Marvel Entertainment multiverse. Bring the excitement and wonder of the Marvel Universe to your collection with figures from the Marvel Legends Series!

Nick Fury Returns to Marvel Legends In the years following the Blip, a weary Fury must face his biggest and most personal challenge yet when he learns of the Skrulls' clandestine invasion of Earth. Nick Fury from Marvel Studios’ Secret Invasion With this figure inspired by Nick Fury and Marvel Studios’ Secret Invasion, take home a piece of the action-packed storyline from the show. This figure comes with 8 series-inspired accessories, including blaster accessories. Premium Articulation & Design in 6-Inch Scale Marvel Legends 6-inch figures bring fan-favorite characters from across the Marvel Entertainment multiverse to fan collections. Highly poseable with MCU-inspired deco, multiple points of articulation, and premium character-inspired accessories, this premium Marvel Legends Series figure is a great addition to any Marvel collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Decent Sam Jackson Nick Figure
reviews.reviewText: I'm a fan of Sam Jackson and this figure is a solid and good figure. I paid full price on this one because I did not want to miss adding this figure to my collection. I like the extras and I'm happy with this offering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great condition, great item, arrived on time
reviews.reviewText: Bought to add to my collections set not intending to remove from the package. Arrived in great condition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great figure to have. Thanks for packing with care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars "Sir, I'm Gonna Have to Ask You to Exit the Donut."
reviews.reviewText: I like the fig. The show was pretty decent... so I had to pick this up. At first, I thought the beanie was part of the head mold, but it isn't. I am extremely happy it isn't, because I didn't like the look too much. This is my first Nick Fury figure, and it does not disappoint! His beard is a bit long if you intend on displaying him as an Avengers (2012) Nick, but it will work. One complaint is the legs and arms are a little warped out of the box and a the legs are a bit hard to pose because of the trench coat. Also, I don't understand Hasbro's choice of pistols. They seem a bit too Star Wars influenced. In the show he uses Glocks. One cool touch though is the different variations of smoke and blast effects. The smaller smoke and blast effects are intended for the suppressed pistol. The other two are for the unsuppressed version. The BAF piece also looks nicely done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks just like him...
reviews.reviewText: Cool toy, looks just like Sam as Nick Fury,with watch cap and eye patch..... Well done.......

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice FURY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the better nick fury figures made, but it has limited posing issue. the legs are blocked by the coat. Making it hard for him to kicks but great for standing i guess...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Nick Fury head. Useless body
reviews.reviewText: The Nick Fury Head sculpt is nice. And joy of joys the stocking cap comes off and fits other figures.Everything from the Neck Down in encased in this stiff unyielding rubber trenchcoat. Making articulation pointless. Did the guy who designed the D&D Movie line make this figure?The accessories are good. A silenced pistol, regular pistor, 2 smoke effects and 2 gunshot effects. Which are nice... but why do Marvel Legends effects parts have a different peg size than GI Joe? Or Indiana Jones? Hasbro makes great smoke effect parts but they don't work with any of their lines that use guns! GAAAHHHH!Still a good Samuel L Jackson head and hat. I put it on a Valaverse Action Force body.
Muy buen rostro de la figura.La Gabardina cerrada impide total movimiento del tronco y piernas.Es un árbol con brazos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my nephew. Loves it. It's got attachments and he can model it with his other characters
Questa versione di Nick Fury è assurda per quanto assomiglia a Samuel L. Jackson. Anche se è alta solo 15 cm. è veramente bella e fa la sua porca figura
Als Samuel L Jackson Fan...ein Muss😁Darf nicht fehlen in der SammlungTop Preis und sehr gut verarbeitet
